text: Kotero dzipereke kwathunthu ku chipembedzo choonadi, chipembedzo, chenicheni, chimene Mulungu adalamula kuti munthu ayenera kutsatira. Chilengedwe chimene Mulungu adalenga mtundu wa anthu sichingasinthidwe. Ndithudi pali Mulungu, icho ndicho chipembedzo choona. Koma ambiri a mtundu wa anthu sadziwa
